content: In 2025, Stenograd’s silent order crumbles when Marek Halden, architect of the all-controlling Behavioral Compliance Index, is found dead and the system falters. As outages grip the city and confusion spreads, powerful Directorate loyalists secretly sabotage utilities, blaming the chaos on the BCI’s collapse to justify tighter control. While officials like Lenart Kova hide evidence and restrict communication, tech activists and workers band together, improvising repairs and exposing the truth. Outraged by the deceit, neighborhoods seize control of their own resources, forming councils and igniting a movement for local democracy, as trust in the old regime evaporates.
